oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Paula Chavis and an All-Star band - 2006-03-11
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Paula Chavis and an All-Star band in tribute to Ray Charles from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 11, 2006. In support of the exhibit I Can’t Stop Loving You: Ray Charles and Country Music.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Paula Chavis; John Birdsong; Rahsaan Barber; Richard Johnson; Marcus Finnie;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Sweet Georgia Brown -- Introduction of band -- You Don't Know Me -- Hallelujah, I Love Him So (Paula Chavis - vocals) -- You Send Me (Paula Chavis) -- Georgia (Paula Chavis) -- Unidentified blues - I Can't Stop Loving You -- Hit The Road, Jack (Paula Chavis) -- Down Home Blues / (Night Time Is) The Right Time (Paula Chavis) -- Closing Comments.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Chavis, Paula; Birdsong, John; Barber, Rahsann; Johnson, Richard; Finnie, Marcus; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
